wordGroup: reverend mother n. （对女修道院院长的称呼）院长嬷嬷
most reverend 最尊敬的大主教大人（大主教的尊称）

sentences.en: The service was led by the Reverend Jim Simons.
sentences.cn: 这次礼拜仪式由吉姆•西蒙斯牧师大人主持。

sentences.en: The Reverend Chris Long led the prayers and pronounced the blessing.
sentences.cn: 克里斯·朗牧师带领祷告并宣讲了祈福祷词。

sentences.en: During the Washington meeting, Reverend Jackson called for a return to family values.
sentences.cn: 在华盛顿会议期间，杰克逊牧师大人呼吁家庭价值观的回归。
